00008 /*
00009  * repodata.c
00010  *
00011  * Manage data coming from one repository
00012  *
00013  * a repository can contain multiple repodata entries, consisting of
00014  * different sets of keys and different sets of solvables
00015  */

00047 void
00048 repodata_initdata(Repodata *data, Repo *repo, int localpool)
00049 {
00050   memset(data, 0, sizeof (*data));
00051   data->repo = repo;
00052   data->localpool = localpool;
00053   if (localpool)
00054     stringpool_init_empty(&data->spool);
00055   data->keys = sat_calloc(1, sizeof(Repokey));
00056   data->nkeys = 1;
00057   data->schemata = sat_calloc(1, sizeof(Id));
00058   data->schemadata = sat_calloc(1, sizeof(Id));
00059   data->nschemata = 1;
00060   data->schemadatalen = 1;
00061   repopagestore_init(&data->store);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void
00065 repodata_freedata(Repodata *data)
00066 {
00067   int i;
00068 
00069   sat_free(data->keys);
00070 
00071   sat_free(data->schemata);
00072   sat_free(data->schemadata);
00073   sat_free(data->schematahash);
00074 
00075   stringpool_free(&data->spool);
00076   dirpool_free(&data->dirpool);
00077 
00078   sat_free(data->mainschemaoffsets);
00079   sat_free(data->incoredata);
00080   sat_free(data->incoreoffset);
00081   sat_free(data->verticaloffset);
00082 
00083   repopagestore_free(&data->store);
00084 
00085   sat_free(data->vincore);
00086 
00087   if (data->attrs)
00088     for (i = 0; i < data->end - data->start; i++)
00089       sat_free(data->attrs[i]);
00090   sat_free(data->attrs);
00091   if (data->xattrs)
00092     for (i = 0; i < data->nxattrs; i++)
00093       sat_free(data->xattrs[i]);
00094   sat_free(data->xattrs);
00095 
00096   sat_free(data->attrdata);
00097   sat_free(data->attriddata);
00098 }
00099 
00100 Repodata *
00101 repodata_create(Repo *repo, int localpool)
00102 {
00103   Repodata *data;
00104 
00105   repo->nrepodata++;
00106   repo->repodata = sat_realloc2(repo->repodata, repo->nrepodata, sizeof(*data));
00107   data = repo->repodata + repo->nrepodata - 1;
00108   repodata_initdata(data, repo, localpool);
00109   return data;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void
00113 repodata_free(Repodata *data)
00114 {
00115   Repo *repo = data->repo;
00116   int i = data - repo->repodata;
00117   repodata_freedata(data);
00118   if (i < repo->nrepodata - 1)
00119     memmove(repo->repodata + i, repo->repodata + i + 1, (repo->nrepodata - 1 - i) * sizeof(Repodata));
00120   repo->nrepodata--;
00121 }

00124 /***************************************************************
00125  * key pool management
00126  */
00127 
00128 /* this is not so time critical that we need a hash, so we do a simple
00129  * linear search */
00130 Id
00131 repodata_key2id(Repodata *data, Repokey *key, int create)
00132 {
00133   Id keyid;
00134 
00135   for (keyid = 1; keyid < data->nkeys; keyid++)
00136     if (data->keys[keyid].name == key->name && data->keys[keyid].type == key->type)
00137       {
00138         if ((key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANT || key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID) && key->size != data->keys[keyid].size)
00139           continue;
00140         break;
00141       }
00142   if (keyid == data->nkeys)
00143     {
00144       if (!create)
00145         return 0;
00146       /* allocate new key */
00147       data->keys = sat_realloc2(data->keys, data->nkeys + 1, sizeof(Repokey));
00148       data->keys[data->nkeys++] = *key;
00149       if (data->verticaloffset)
00150         {
00151           data->verticaloffset = sat_realloc2(data->verticaloffset, data->nkeys, sizeof(Id));
00152           data->verticaloffset[data->nkeys - 1] = 0;
00153         }
00154       data->keybits[(key->name >> 3) & (sizeof(data->keybits) - 1)] |= 1 << (key->name & 7);
00155     }
00156   return keyid;
00157 }

00160 /***************************************************************
00161  * schema pool management
00162  */
00163 
00164 #define SCHEMATA_BLOCK 31
00165 #define SCHEMATADATA_BLOCK 255
00166 
00167 Id
00168 repodata_schema2id(Repodata *data, Id *schema, int create)
00169 {
00170   int h, len, i;
00171   Id *sp, cid;
00172   Id *schematahash;
00173 
00174   if ((schematahash = data->schematahash) == 0)
00175     {
00176       data->schematahash = schematahash = sat_calloc(256, sizeof(Id));
00177       for (i = 0; i < data->nschemata; i++)
00178         {
00179           for (sp = data->schemadata + data->schemata[i], h = 0; *sp; len++)
00180             h = h * 7 + *sp++;
00181           h &= 255;
00182           schematahash[h] = i + 1;
00183         }
00184       data->schemadata = sat_extend_resize(data->schemadata, data->schemadatalen, sizeof(Id), SCHEMATADATA_BLOCK);
00185       data->schemata = sat_extend_resize(data->schemata, data->nschemata, sizeof(Id), SCHEMATA_BLOCK);
00186     }
00187 
00188   for (sp = schema, len = 0, h = 0; *sp; len++)
00189     h = h * 7 + *sp++;
00190   h &= 255;
00191   len++;
00192 
00193   cid = schematahash[h];
00194   if (cid)
00195     {
00196       cid--;
00197       if (!memcmp(data->schemadata + data->schemata[cid], schema, len * sizeof(Id)))
00198         return cid;
00199       /* cache conflict */
00200       for (cid = 0; cid < data->nschemata; cid++)
00201         if (!memcmp(data->schemadata + data->schemata[cid], schema, len * sizeof(Id)))
00202           return cid;
00203     }
00204   /* a new one */
00205   if (!create)
00206     return 0;
00207   data->schemadata = sat_extend(data->schemadata, data->schemadatalen, len, sizeof(Id), SCHEMATADATA_BLOCK);
00208   data->schemata = sat_extend(data->schemata, data->nschemata, 1, sizeof(Id), SCHEMATA_BLOCK);
00209   /* add schema */
00210   memcpy(data->schemadata + data->schemadatalen, schema, len * sizeof(Id));
00211   data->schemata[data->nschemata] = data->schemadatalen;
00212   data->schemadatalen += len;
00213   schematahash[h] = data->nschemata + 1;
00214 #if 0
00215 fprintf(stderr, "schema2id: new schema\n");
00216 #endif
00217   return data->nschemata++;
00218 }
00219 
00220 void
00221 repodata_free_schemahash(Repodata *data)
00222 {
00223   data->schematahash = sat_free(data->schematahash);
00224   /* shrink arrays */
00225   data->schemata = sat_realloc2(data->schemata, data->nschemata, sizeof(Id));
00226   data->schemadata = sat_realloc2(data->schemadata, data->schemadatalen, sizeof(Id));
00227 }

00229 #if 1
00230 char const* strchrnul(char const* str, char x)
00231 {
00232     char const* p = strchr(str, x);
00233     return p ? p : str + strlen(str);
00234 }

00237 /***************************************************************
00238  * dir pool management
00239  */
00240 
00241 Id
00242 repodata_str2dir(Repodata *data, const char *dir, int create)
00243 {
00244   Id id, parent;
00245   const char *dire;
00246 
00247   parent = 0;
00248   while (*dir == '/' && dir[1] == '/')
00249     dir++;
00250   if (*dir == '/' && !dir[1])
00251     {
00252       if (data->dirpool.ndirs)
00253         return 1;
00254       return dirpool_add_dir(&data->dirpool, 0, 1, create);
00255     }
00256   while (*dir)
00257     {
00258       dire = strchrnul(dir, '/');
00259       if (data->localpool)
00260         id = stringpool_strn2id(&data->spool, dir, dire - dir, create);
00261       else
00262         id = strn2id(data->repo->pool, dir, dire - dir, create);
00263       if (!id)
00264         return 0;
00265       parent = dirpool_add_dir(&data->dirpool, parent, id, create);
00266       if (!parent)
00267         return 0;
00268       if (!*dire)
00269         break;
00270       dir = dire + 1;
00271       while (*dir == '/')
00272         dir++;
00273     }
00274   return parent;
00275 }
00276 
00277 const char *
00278 repodata_dir2str(Repodata *data, Id did, const char *suf)
00279 {
00280   Pool *pool = data->repo->pool;
00281   int l = 0;
00282   Id parent, comp;
00283   const char *comps;
00284   char *p;
00285 
00286   if (!did)
00287     return suf ? suf : "";
00288   parent = did;
00289   while (parent)
00290     {
00291       comp = dirpool_compid(&data->dirpool, parent);
00292       comps = stringpool_id2str(data->localpool ? &data->spool : &pool->ss, comp);
00293       l += strlen(comps);
00294       parent = dirpool_parent(&data->dirpool, parent);
00295       if (parent)
00296         l++;
00297     }
00298   if (suf)
00299     l += strlen(suf) + 1;
00300   p = pool_alloctmpspace(pool, l + 1) + l;
00301   *p = 0;
00302   if (suf)
00303     {
00304       p -= strlen(suf);
00305       strcpy(p, suf);
00306       *--p = '/';
00307     }
00308   parent = did;
00309   while (parent)
00310     {
00311       comp = dirpool_compid(&data->dirpool, parent);
00312       comps = stringpool_id2str(data->localpool ? &data->spool : &pool->ss, comp);
00313       l = strlen(comps);
00314       p -= l;
00315       strncpy(p, comps, l);
00316       parent = dirpool_parent(&data->dirpool, parent);
00317       if (parent)
00318         *--p = '/';
00319     }
00320   return p;
00321 }

00324 /***************************************************************
00325  * data management
00326  */
00327 
00328 static inline unsigned char *
00329 data_skip_schema(Repodata *data, unsigned char *dp, Id schema)
00330 {
00331   Id *keyp = data->schemadata + data->schemata[schema];
00332   for (; *keyp; keyp++)
00333     dp = data_skip_key(data, dp, data->keys + *keyp);
00334   return dp;
00335 }
00336 
00337 unsigned char *
00338 data_skip_key(Repodata *data, unsigned char *dp, Repokey *key)
00339 {
00340   int nentries, schema;
00341   switch(key->type)
00342     {
00343     case REPOKEY_TYPE_FIXARRAY:
00344       dp = data_read_id(dp, &nentries);
00345       if (!nentries)
00346         return dp;
00347       dp = data_read_id(dp, &schema);
00348       while (nentries--)
00349         dp = data_skip_schema(data, dp, schema);
00350       return dp;
00351     case REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY:
00352       dp = data_read_id(dp, &nentries);
00353       while (nentries--)
00354         {
00355           dp = data_read_id(dp, &schema);
00356           dp = data_skip_schema(data, dp, schema);
00357         }
00358       return dp;
00359     default:
00360       if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_INCORE)
00361         dp = data_skip(dp, key->type);
00362       else if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_VERTICAL_OFFSET)
00363         {
00364           dp = data_skip(dp, REPOKEY_TYPE_ID);
00365           dp = data_skip(dp, REPOKEY_TYPE_ID);
00366         }
00367       return dp;
00368     }
00369 }
00370 
00371 static unsigned char *
00372 forward_to_key(Repodata *data, Id keyid, Id *keyp, unsigned char *dp)
00373 {
00374   Id k;
00375 
00376   if (!keyid)
00377     return 0;
00378   if (data->mainschemaoffsets && dp == data->incoredata + data->mainschemaoffsets[0] && keyp == data->schemadata + data->schemata[data->mainschema])
00379     {
00380       int i;
00381       for (i = 0; (k = *keyp++) != 0; i++)
00382         if (k == keyid)
00383           return data->incoredata + data->mainschemaoffsets[i];
00384       return 0;
00385     }
00386   while ((k = *keyp++) != 0)
00387     {
00388       if (k == keyid)
00389         return dp;
00390       if (data->keys[k].storage == KEY_STORAGE_VERTICAL_OFFSET)
00391         {
00392           dp = data_skip(dp, REPOKEY_TYPE_ID);  /* skip offset */
00393           dp = data_skip(dp, REPOKEY_TYPE_ID);  /* skip length */
00394           continue;
00395         }
00396       if (data->keys[k].storage != KEY_STORAGE_INCORE)
00397         continue;
00398       dp = data_skip_key(data, dp, data->keys + k);
00399     }
00400   return 0;
00401 }
00402 
00403 static unsigned char *
00404 get_vertical_data(Repodata *data, Repokey *key, Id off, Id len)
00405 {
00406   unsigned char *dp;
00407   if (!len)
00408     return 0;
00409   if (off >= data->lastverticaloffset)
00410     {
00411       off -= data->lastverticaloffset;
00412       if (off + len > data->vincorelen)
00413         return 0;
00414       return data->vincore + off;
00415     }
00416   if (off + len > key->size)
00417     return 0;
00418   /* we now have the offset, go into vertical */
00419   off += data->verticaloffset[key - data->keys];
00420   /* fprintf(stderr, "key %d page %d\n", key->name, off / BLOB_PAGESIZE); */
00421   dp = repopagestore_load_page_range(&data->store, off / BLOB_PAGESIZE, (off + len - 1) / BLOB_PAGESIZE);
00422   if (dp)
00423     dp += off % BLOB_PAGESIZE;
00424   return dp;
00425 }
00426 
00427 static inline unsigned char *
00428 get_data(Repodata *data, Repokey *key, unsigned char **dpp, int advance)
00429 {
00430   unsigned char *dp = *dpp;
00431 
00432   if (!dp)
00433     return 0;
00434   if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_INCORE)
00435     {
00436       if (advance)
00437         *dpp = data_skip_key(data, dp, key);
00438       return dp;
00439     }
00440   else if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_VERTICAL_OFFSET)
00441     {
00442       Id off, len;
00443       dp = data_read_id(dp, &off);
00444       dp = data_read_id(dp, &len);
00445       if (advance)
00446         *dpp = dp;
00447       return get_vertical_data(data, key, off, len);
00448     }
00449   return 0;
00450 }
00451 
00452 static int
00453 load_repodata(Repodata *data)
00454 {
00455   if (data->loadcallback)
00456     {
00457       data->loadcallback(data);
00458       if (data->state == REPODATA_AVAILABLE)
00459         return 1;
00460     }
00461   data->state = REPODATA_ERROR;
00462   return 0;
00463 }
00464 
00465 static inline int
00466 maybe_load_repodata(Repodata *data, Id keyname)
00467 {
00468   if (keyname && !repodata_precheck_keyname(data, keyname))
00469     return 0;   /* do not bother... */
00470   switch(data->state)
00471     {
00472     case REPODATA_STUB:
00473       if (keyname)
00474         {
00475           int i;
00476           for (i = 0; i < data->nkeys; i++)
00477             if (keyname == data->keys[i].name)
00478               break;
00479           if (i == data->nkeys)
00480             return 0;
00481         }
00482       return load_repodata(data);
00483     case REPODATA_ERROR:
00484       return 0;
00485     case REPODATA_AVAILABLE:
00486     case REPODATA_LOADING:
00487       return 1;
00488     default:
00489       data->state = REPODATA_ERROR;
00490       return 0;
00491     }
00492 }
00493 
00494 static inline unsigned char *
00495 solvid2data(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id *schemap)
00496 {
00497   unsigned char *dp = data->incoredata;
00498   if (!dp)
00499     return 0;
00500   if (solvid == SOLVID_META)    /* META */
00501     dp += 1;
00502   else if (solvid == SOLVID_POS)        /* META */
00503     {
00504       Pool *pool = data->repo->pool;
00505       if (data->repo != pool->pos.repo)
00506         return 0;
00507       if (data != data->repo->repodata + pool->pos.repodataid)
00508         return 0;
00509       *schemap = pool->pos.schema;
00510       return data->incoredata + pool->pos.dp;
00511     }
00512   else
00513     {
00514       if (solvid < data->start || solvid >= data->end)
00515         return 0;
00516       dp += data->incoreoffset[solvid - data->start];
00517     }
00518   return data_read_id(dp, schemap);
00519 }
00520 
00521 /************************************************************************
00522  * data lookup
00523  */
00524 
00525 static inline unsigned char *
00526 find_key_data(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Repokey **keypp)
00527 {
00528   unsigned char *dp;
00529   Id schema, *keyp, *kp;
00530   Repokey *key;
00531 
00532   if (!maybe_load_repodata(data, keyname))
00533     return 0;
00534   dp = solvid2data(data, solvid, &schema);
00535   if (!dp)
00536     return 0;
00537   keyp = data->schemadata + data->schemata[schema];
00538   for (kp = keyp; *kp; kp++)
00539     if (data->keys[*kp].name == keyname)
00540       break;
00541   if (!*kp)
00542     return 0;
00543   *keypp = key = data->keys + *kp;
00544   if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_VOID || key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANT || key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID)
00545     return dp;  /* no need to forward... */
00546   dp = forward_to_key(data, *kp, keyp, dp);
00547   if (!dp)
00548     return 0;
00549   return get_data(data, key, &dp, 0);
00550 }
00551 
00552 
00553 Id
00554 repodata_lookup_id(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname)
00555 {
00556   unsigned char *dp;
00557   Repokey *key;
00558   Id id;
00559 
00560   dp = find_key_data(data, solvid, keyname, &key);
00561   if (!dp)
00562     return 0;
00563   if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID)
00564     return key->size;
00565   if (key->type != REPOKEY_TYPE_ID)
00566     return 0;
00567   dp = data_read_id(dp, &id);
00568   return id;
00569 }

00571 Id
00572 repodata_globalize_id(Repodata *data, Id id, int create)
00573 {
00574   if (!id || !data || !data->localpool)
00575     return id;
00576   return str2id(data->repo->pool, stringpool_id2str(&data->spool, id), create);
00577 }
00578 
00579 const char *
00580 repodata_lookup_str(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname)
00581 {
00582   unsigned char *dp;
00583   Repokey *key;
00584   Id id;
00585 
00586   dp = find_key_data(data, solvid, keyname, &key);
00587   if (!dp)
00588     return 0;
00589   if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_STR)
00590     return (const char *)dp;
00591   if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID)
00592     return id2str(data->repo->pool, key->size);
00593   if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_ID)
00594     dp = data_read_id(dp, &id);
00595   else
00596     return 0;
00597   if (data->localpool)
00598     return data->spool.stringspace + data->spool.strings[id];
00599   return id2str(data->repo->pool, id);
00600 }
00601 
00602 int
00603 repodata_lookup_num(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, unsigned int *value)
00604 {
00605   unsigned char *dp;
00606   Repokey *key;
00607   KeyValue kv;
00608 
00609   *value = 0;
00610   dp = find_key_data(data, solvid, keyname, &key);
00611   if (!dp)
00612     return 0;
00613   if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_NUM
00614       || key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_U32
00615       || key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANT)
00616     {
00617       dp = data_fetch(dp, &kv, key);
00618       *value = kv.num;
00619       return 1;
00620     }
00621   return 0;
00622 }
00623 
00624 int
00625 repodata_lookup_void(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname)
00626 {
00627   Id schema;
00628   Id *keyp;
00629   unsigned char *dp;
00630 
00631   if (!maybe_load_repodata(data, keyname))
00632     return 0;
00633   dp = solvid2data(data, solvid, &schema);
00634   if (!dp)
00635     return 0;
00636   /* can't use find_key_data as we need to test the type */
00637   for (keyp = data->schemadata + data->schemata[schema]; *keyp; keyp++)
00638     if (data->keys[*keyp].name == keyname && data->keys[*keyp].type == REPOKEY_TYPE_VOID)
00639       return 1;
00640   return 0;
00641 }

00643 const unsigned char *
00644 repodata_lookup_bin_checksum(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id *typep)
00645 {
00646   unsigned char *dp;
00647   Repokey *key;
00648 
00649   dp = find_key_data(data, solvid, keyname, &key);
00650   if (!dp)
00651     return 0;
00652   *typep = key->type;
00653   return dp;
00654 }
00655 
00656 int
00657 repodata_lookup_idarray(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Queue *q)
00658 {
00659   unsigned char *dp;
00660   Repokey *key;
00661   Id id;
00662   int eof = 0;
00663 
00664   queue_empty(q);
00665   dp = find_key_data(data, solvid, keyname, &key);
00666   if (!dp)
00667     return 0;
00668   for (;;)
00669     {
00670       dp = data_read_ideof(dp, &id, &eof);
00671       queue_push(q, id);
00672       if (eof)
00673         break;
00674     }
00675   return 1;
00676 }
00677 
00678 /************************************************************************
00679  * data search
00680  */
00681 
00682 
00683 int
00684 repodata_stringify(Pool *pool, Repodata *data, Repokey *key, KeyValue *kv, int flags)
00685 {
00686   switch (key->type)
00687     {
00688     case REPOKEY_TYPE_ID:
00689     case REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID:
00690     case REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY:
00691       if (data && data->localpool)
00692         kv->str = stringpool_id2str(&data->spool, kv->id);
00693       else
00694         kv->str = id2str(pool, kv->id);
00695       if ((flags & SEARCH_SKIP_KIND) != 0 && key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE)
00696         {
00697           const char *s;
00698           for (s = kv->str; *s >= 'a' && *s <= 'z'; s++)
00699             ;
00700           if (*s == ':' && s > kv->str)
00701             kv->str = s + 1;
00702         }
00703       return 1;
00704     case REPOKEY_TYPE_STR:
00705       return 1;
00706     case REPOKEY_TYPE_DIRSTRARRAY:
00707       if (!(flags & SEARCH_FILES))
00708         return 1;       /* match just the basename */
00709       /* Put the full filename into kv->str.  */
00710       kv->str = repodata_dir2str(data, kv->id, kv->str);
00711       /* And to compensate for that put the "empty" directory into
00712          kv->id, so that later calls to repodata_dir2str on this data
00713          come up with the same filename again.  */
00714       kv->id = 0;
00715       return 1;
00716     case REPOKEY_TYPE_MD5:
00717     case REPOKEY_TYPE_SHA1:
00718     case REPOKEY_TYPE_SHA256:
00719       if (!(flags & SEARCH_CHECKSUMS))
00720         return 0;       /* skip em */
00721       kv->str = repodata_chk2str(data, key->type, (const unsigned char *)kv->str);
00722       return 1;
00723     default:
00724       return 0;
00725     }
00726 }
00727 
00728 
00729 struct subschema_data {
00730   Solvable *s;
00731   void *cbdata;
00732   KeyValue *parent;
00733 };
00734 
00735 /* search a specific repodata */
00736 void
00737 repodata_search(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, int flags, int (*callback)(void *cbdata, Solvable *s, Repodata *data, Repokey *key, KeyValue *kv), void *cbdata)
00738 {
00739   Id schema;
00740   Repokey *key;
00741   Id keyid, *kp, *keyp;
00742   unsigned char *dp, *ddp;
00743   int onekey = 0;
00744   int stop;
00745   KeyValue kv;
00746   Solvable *s;
00747 
00748   if (!maybe_load_repodata(data, keyname))
00749     return;
00750   if (solvid == SOLVID_SUBSCHEMA)
00751     {
00752       struct subschema_data *subd = cbdata;
00753       cbdata = subd->cbdata;
00754       s = subd->s;
00755       schema = subd->parent->id;
00756       dp = (unsigned char *)subd->parent->str;
00757       kv.parent = subd->parent;
00758     }
00759   else
00760     {
00761       schema = 0;
00762       dp = solvid2data(data, solvid, &schema);
00763       if (!dp)
00764         return;
00765       s = data->repo->pool->solvables + solvid;
00766       kv.parent = 0;
00767     }
00768   keyp = data->schemadata + data->schemata[schema];
00769   if (keyname)
00770     {
00771       /* search for a specific key */
00772       for (kp = keyp; *kp; kp++)
00773         if (data->keys[*kp].name == keyname)
00774           break;
00775       if (!*kp)
00776         return;
00777       dp = forward_to_key(data, *kp, keyp, dp);
00778       if (!dp)
00779         return;
00780       keyp = kp;
00781       onekey = 1;
00782     }
00783   while ((keyid = *keyp++) != 0)
00784     {
00785       stop = 0;
00786       key = data->keys + keyid;
00787       ddp = get_data(data, key, &dp, *keyp ? 1 : 0);
00788 
00789       if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY || key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FIXARRAY)
00790         {
00791           struct subschema_data subd;
00792           int nentries;
00793           Id schema = 0;
00794 
00795           subd.cbdata = cbdata;
00796           subd.s = s;
00797           subd.parent = &kv;
00798           ddp = data_read_id(ddp, &nentries);
00799           kv.num = nentries;
00800           kv.entry = 0;
00801           kv.eof = 0;
00802           while (ddp && nentries > 0)
00803             {
00804               if (!--nentries)
00805                 kv.eof = 1;
00806               if (key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY || !kv.entry)
00807                 ddp = data_read_id(ddp, &schema);
00808               kv.id = schema;
00809               kv.str = (char *)ddp;
00810               stop = callback(cbdata, s, data, key, &kv);
00811               if (stop > SEARCH_NEXT_KEY)
00812                 return;
00813               if (stop && stop != SEARCH_ENTERSUB)
00814                 break;
00815               if ((flags & SEARCH_SUB) != 0 || stop == SEARCH_ENTERSUB)
00816                 repodata_search(data, SOLVID_SUBSCHEMA, 0, flags, callback, &subd);
00817               ddp = data_skip_schema(data, ddp, schema);
00818               kv.entry++;
00819             }
00820           if (!nentries && (flags & SEARCH_ARRAYSENTINEL) != 0)
00821             {
00822               /* sentinel */
00823               kv.eof = 2;
00824               kv.str = (char *)ddp;
00825               stop = callback(cbdata, s, data, key, &kv);
00826               if (stop > SEARCH_NEXT_KEY)
00827                 return;
00828             }
00829           if (onekey)
00830             return;
00831           continue;
00832         }
00833       kv.entry = 0;
00834       do
00835         {
00836           ddp = data_fetch(ddp, &kv, key);
00837           if (!ddp)
00838             break;
00839           stop = callback(cbdata, s, data, key, &kv);
00840           kv.entry++;
00841         }
00842       while (!kv.eof && !stop);
00843       if (onekey || stop > SEARCH_NEXT_KEY)
00844         return;
00845     }
00846 }
00847 
00848 void
00849 repodata_setpos_kv(Repodata *data, KeyValue *kv)
00850 {
00851   Pool *pool = data->repo->pool;
00852   if (!kv)
00853     pool_clear_pos(pool);
00854   else
00855     {
00856       pool->pos.repo = data->repo;
00857       pool->pos.repodataid = data - data->repo->repodata;
00858       pool->pos.dp = (unsigned char *)kv->str - data->incoredata;
00859       pool->pos.schema = kv->id;
00860     }
00861 }
00862 
00863 /************************************************************************
00864  * data iterator functions
00865  */
00866 
00867 static Repokey solvablekeys[RPM_RPMDBID - SOLVABLE_NAME + 1] = {
00868   { SOLVABLE_NAME,        REPOKEY_TYPE_ID, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00869   { SOLVABLE_ARCH,        REPOKEY_TYPE_ID, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00870   { SOLVABLE_EVR,         REPOKEY_TYPE_ID, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00871   { SOLVABLE_VENDOR,      REPOKEY_TYPE_ID, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00872   { SOLVABLE_PROVIDES,    REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00873   { SOLVABLE_OBSOLETES,   REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00874   { SOLVABLE_CONFLICTS,   REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00875   { SOLVABLE_REQUIRES,    REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00876   { SOLVABLE_RECOMMENDS,  REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00877   { SOLVABLE_SUGGESTS,    REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00878   { SOLVABLE_SUPPLEMENTS, REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00879   { SOLVABLE_ENHANCES,    REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00880   { RPM_RPMDBID,          REPOKEY_TYPE_U32, 0, KEY_STORAGE_SOLVABLE },
00881 };
00882 
00883 static inline Id *
00884 solvabledata_fetch(Solvable *s, KeyValue *kv, Id keyname)
00885 {
00886   kv->id = keyname;
00887   switch (keyname)
00888     {
00889     case SOLVABLE_NAME:
00890       kv->eof = 1;
00891       return &s->name;
00892     case SOLVABLE_ARCH:
00893       kv->eof = 1;
00894       return &s->arch;
00895     case SOLVABLE_EVR:
00896       kv->eof = 1;
00897       return &s->evr;
00898     case SOLVABLE_VENDOR:
00899       kv->eof = 1;
00900       return &s->vendor;
00901     case SOLVABLE_PROVIDES:
00902       kv->eof = 0;
00903       return s->provides ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->provides : 0;
00904     case SOLVABLE_OBSOLETES:
00905       kv->eof = 0;
00906       return s->obsoletes ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->obsoletes : 0;
00907     case SOLVABLE_CONFLICTS:
00908       kv->eof = 0;
00909       return s->conflicts ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->conflicts : 0;
00910     case SOLVABLE_REQUIRES:
00911       kv->eof = 0;
00912       return s->requires ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->requires : 0;
00913     case SOLVABLE_RECOMMENDS:
00914       kv->eof = 0;
00915       return s->recommends ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->recommends : 0;
00916     case SOLVABLE_SUPPLEMENTS:
00917       kv->eof = 0;
00918       return s->supplements ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->supplements : 0;
00919     case SOLVABLE_SUGGESTS:
00920       kv->eof = 0;
00921       return s->suggests ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->suggests : 0;
00922     case SOLVABLE_ENHANCES:
00923       kv->eof = 0;
00924       return s->enhances ? s->repo->idarraydata + s->enhances : 0;
00925     case RPM_RPMDBID:
00926       kv->eof = 1;
00927       return s->repo->rpmdbid ? s->repo->rpmdbid + (s - s->repo->pool->solvables - s->repo->start) : 0;
00928     default:
00929       return 0;
00930     }
00931 }
00932 
00933 int
00934 datamatcher_init(Datamatcher *ma, const char *match, int flags)
00935 {
00936   ma->match = match;
00937   ma->flags = flags;
00938   ma->error = 0;
00939   ma->matchdata = 0;
00940   if ((flags & SEARCH_STRINGMASK) == SEARCH_REGEX)
00941     {
00942       ma->matchdata = sat_calloc(1, sizeof(regex_t));
00943       ma->error = regcomp((regex_t *)ma->matchdata, match, REG_EXTENDED | REG_NOSUB | REG_NEWLINE | ((flags & SEARCH_NOCASE) ? REG_ICASE : 0));
00944       if (ma->error)
00945         {
00946           sat_free(ma->matchdata);
00947           ma->flags = (flags & ~SEARCH_STRINGMASK) | SEARCH_ERROR;
00948         }
00949     }
00950   return ma->error;
00951 }
00952 
00953 void
00954 datamatcher_free(Datamatcher *ma)
00955 {
00956   if ((ma->flags & SEARCH_STRINGMASK) == SEARCH_REGEX && ma->matchdata)
00957     {
00958       regfree(ma->matchdata);
00959       ma->matchdata = sat_free(ma->matchdata);
00960     }
00961 }
00962 
00963 int
00964 datamatcher_match(Datamatcher *ma, const char *str)
00965 {
00966   int l;
00967   switch ((ma->flags & SEARCH_STRINGMASK))
00968     {
00969     case SEARCH_SUBSTRING:
00970       if (ma->flags & SEARCH_NOCASE)
00971         {
00972           if (!strcasestr(str, ma->match))
00973             return 0;
00974         }
00975       else
00976         {
00977           if (!strstr(str, ma->match))
00978             return 0;
00979         }
00980       break;
00981     case SEARCH_STRING:
00982       if (ma->flags & SEARCH_NOCASE)
00983         {
00984           if (strcasecmp(ma->match, str))
00985             return 0;
00986         }
00987       else
00988         {
00989           if (strcmp(ma->match, str))
00990             return 0;
00991         }
00992       break;
00993     case SEARCH_STRINGSTART:
00994       if (ma->flags & SEARCH_NOCASE)
00995         {
00996           if (strncasecmp(ma->match, str, strlen(ma->match)))
00997             return 0;
00998         }
00999       else
01000         {
01001           if (strncmp(ma->match, str, strlen(ma->match)))
01002             return 0;
01003         }
01004       break;
01005     case SEARCH_STRINGEND:
01006       l = strlen(str) - strlen(ma->match);
01007       if (l < 0)
01008         return 0;
01009       if (ma->flags & SEARCH_NOCASE)
01010         {
01011           if (strcasecmp(ma->match, str + l))
01012             return 0;
01013         }
01014       else
01015         {
01016           if (strcmp(ma->match, str + l))
01017             return 0;
01018         }
01019       break;
01020     case SEARCH_GLOB:
01021       if (fnmatch(ma->match, str, (ma->flags & SEARCH_NOCASE) ? FNM_CASEFOLD : 0))
01022         return 0;
01023       break;
01024     case SEARCH_REGEX:
01025       if (regexec((const regex_t *)ma->matchdata, str, 0, NULL, 0))
01026         return 0;
01027       break;
01028     default:
01029       return 0;
01030     }
01031   return 1;
01032 }
01033 
01034 int
01035 repodata_filelistfilter_matches(Repodata *data, const char *str)
01036 {
01037   /* '.*bin\/.*', '^\/etc\/.*', '^\/usr\/lib\/sendmail$' */
01038   /* for now hardcoded */
01039   if (strstr(str, "bin/"))
01040     return 1;
01041   if (!strncmp(str, "/etc/", 5))
01042     return 1;
01043   if (!strcmp(str, "/usr/lib/sendmail"))
01044     return 1;
01045   return 0;
01046 }
01047 
01048 
01049 enum {
01050   di_bye,
01051 
01052   di_enterrepo,
01053   di_entersolvable,
01054   di_enterrepodata,
01055   di_enterschema,
01056   di_enterkey,
01057 
01058   di_nextattr,
01059   di_nextkey,
01060   di_nextrepodata,
01061   di_nextsolvable,
01062   di_nextrepo,
01063 
01064   di_enterarray,
01065   di_nextarrayelement,
01066 
01067   di_entersub,
01068   di_leavesub,
01069 
01070   di_nextsolvableattr,
01071   di_nextsolvablekey,
01072   di_entersolvablekey
01073 };
01074 
01075 /* see repo.h for documentation */
01076 int
01077 dataiterator_init(Dataiterator *di, Pool *pool, Repo *repo, Id p, Id keyname, const char *match, int flags)
01078 {
01079   memset(di, 0, sizeof(*di));
01080   di->pool = pool;
01081   di->flags = flags & ~SEARCH_THISSOLVID;
01082   if (!pool || (repo && repo->pool != pool))
01083     {
01084       di->state = di_bye;
01085       return -1;
01086     }
01087   if (match)
01088     {
01089       int error;
01090       if ((error = datamatcher_init(&di->matcher, match, flags)) != 0)
01091         {
01092           di->state = di_bye;
01093           return error;
01094         }
01095     }
01096   di->keyname = keyname;
01097   di->keynames[0] = keyname;
01098   dataiterator_set_search(di, repo, p);
01099   return 0;
01100 }
01101 
01102 void
01103 dataiterator_init_clone(Dataiterator *di, Dataiterator *from)
01104 {
01105   *di = *from;
01106   memset(&di->matcher, 0, sizeof(di->matcher));
01107   if (from->matcher.match)
01108     datamatcher_init(&di->matcher, from->matcher.match, from->matcher.flags);
01109   if (di->nparents)
01110     {
01111       /* fix pointers */
01112       int i;
01113       for (i = 1; i < di->nparents; i++)
01114         di->parents[i].kv.parent = &di->parents[i - 1].kv;
01115       di->kv.parent = &di->parents[di->nparents - 1].kv;
01116     }
01117 }
01118 
01119 int
01120 dataiterator_set_match(Dataiterator *di, const char *match, int flags)
01121 {
01122   di->flags = (flags & ~SEARCH_THISSOLVID) | (di->flags & SEARCH_THISSOLVID);
01123   datamatcher_free(&di->matcher);
01124   memset(&di->matcher, 0, sizeof(di->matcher));
01125   if (match)
01126     {
01127       int error;
01128       if ((error = datamatcher_init(&di->matcher, match, flags)) != 0)
01129         {
01130           di->state = di_bye;
01131           return error;
01132         }
01133     }
01134   return 0;
01135 }
01136 
01137 void
01138 dataiterator_set_search(Dataiterator *di, Repo *repo, Id p)
01139 {
01140   di->repo = repo;
01141   di->repoid = -1;
01142   di->flags &= ~SEARCH_THISSOLVID;
01143   di->nparents = 0;
01144   di->rootlevel = 0;
01145   di->repodataid = 0;
01146   if (!di->pool->nrepos)
01147     {
01148       di->state = di_bye;
01149       return;
01150     }
01151   if (!repo)
01152     {
01153       di->repoid = 0;
01154       di->repo = di->pool->repos[0];
01155     }
01156   di->state = di_enterrepo;
01157   if (p)
01158     dataiterator_jump_to_solvid(di, p);
01159 }
01160 
01161 void
01162 dataiterator_set_keyname(Dataiterator *di, Id keyname)
01163 {
01164   di->nkeynames = 0;
01165   di->keyname = keyname;
01166   di->keynames[0] = keyname;
01167 }
01168 
01169 void
01170 dataiterator_prepend_keyname(Dataiterator *di, Id keyname)
01171 {
01172   int i;
01173 
01174   if (di->nkeynames >= sizeof(di->keynames)/sizeof(*di->keynames) - 2)
01175     {
01176       di->state = di_bye;       /* sorry */
01177       return;
01178     }
01179   for (i = di->nkeynames + 1; i > 0; i--)
01180     di->keynames[i] = di->keynames[i - 1];
01181   di->keynames[0] = di->keyname = keyname;
01182   di->nkeynames++;
01183 }
01184 
01185 void
01186 dataiterator_free(Dataiterator *di)
01187 {
01188   if (di->matcher.match)
01189     datamatcher_free(&di->matcher);
01190 }
01191 
01192 static inline unsigned char *
01193 dataiterator_find_keyname(Dataiterator *di, Id keyname)
01194 {
01195   Id *keyp = di->keyp;
01196   Repokey *keys = di->data->keys;
01197   unsigned char *dp;
01198 
01199   for (keyp = di->keyp; *keyp; keyp++)
01200     if (keys[*keyp].name == keyname)
01201       break;
01202   if (!*keyp)
01203     return 0;
01204   dp = forward_to_key(di->data, *keyp, di->keyp, di->dp);
01205   if (!dp)
01206     return 0;
01207   di->keyp = keyp;
01208   return dp;
01209 }
01210 
01211 static int
01212 dataiterator_filelistcheck(Dataiterator *di)
01213 {
01214   int j;
01215   int needcomplete = 0;
01216   Repodata *data = di->data;
01217 
01218   if ((di->matcher.flags & SEARCH_COMPLETE_FILELIST) != 0)
01219     if (!di->matcher.match
01220        || ((di->matcher.flags & (SEARCH_STRINGMASK|SEARCH_NOCASE)) != SEARCH_STRING
01221            && (di->matcher.flags & (SEARCH_STRINGMASK|SEARCH_NOCASE)) != SEARCH_GLOB)
01222        || !repodata_filelistfilter_matches(di->data, di->matcher.match))
01223       needcomplete = 1;
01224   if (data->state != REPODATA_AVAILABLE)
01225     return needcomplete ? 1 : 0;
01226   for (j = 1; j < data->nkeys; j++)
01227     if (data->keys[j].name != REPOSITORY_SOLVABLES && data->keys[j].name != SOLVABLE_FILELIST)
01228       break;
01229   return j == data->nkeys && !needcomplete ? 0 : 1;
01230 }
01231 
01232 int
01233 dataiterator_step(Dataiterator *di)
01234 {
01235   Id schema;
01236 
01237   for (;;)
01238     {
01239       switch (di->state)
01240         {
01241         case di_enterrepo: di_enterrepo:
01242           if (!di->repo)
01243             goto di_bye;
01244           if (di->repo->disabled && !(di->flags & SEARCH_DISABLED_REPOS))
01245             goto di_nextrepo;
01246           if (!(di->flags & SEARCH_THISSOLVID))
01247             {
01248               di->solvid = di->repo->start - 1; /* reset solvid iterator */
01249               goto di_nextsolvable;
01250             }
01251           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01252 
01253         case di_entersolvable: di_entersolvable:
01254           if (di->repodataid >= 0)
01255             {
01256               di->repodataid = 0;       /* reset repodata iterator */
01257               if (di->solvid > 0 && !(di->flags & SEARCH_NO_STORAGE_SOLVABLE) && (!di->keyname || (di->keyname >= SOLVABLE_NAME && di->keyname <= RPM_RPMDBID)) && di->nparents - di->rootlevel == di->nkeynames)
01258                 {
01259                   di->key = solvablekeys + (di->keyname ? di->keyname - SOLVABLE_NAME : 0);
01260                   di->data = 0;
01261                   goto di_entersolvablekey;
01262                 }
01263             }
01264           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01265 
01266         case di_enterrepodata: di_enterrepodata:
01267           if (di->repodataid >= 0)
01268             {
01269               if (di->repodataid >= di->repo->nrepodata)
01270                 goto di_nextsolvable;
01271               di->data = di->repo->repodata + di->repodataid;
01272             }
01273           if (di->repodataid >= 0 && di->keyname == SOLVABLE_FILELIST && !dataiterator_filelistcheck(di))
01274             goto di_nextrepodata;
01275           if (!maybe_load_repodata(di->data, di->keyname))
01276             goto di_nextrepodata;
01277           di->dp = solvid2data(di->data, di->solvid, &schema);
01278           if (!di->dp)
01279             goto di_nextrepodata;
01280           if (di->solvid == SOLVID_POS)
01281             di->solvid = di->pool->pos.solvid;
01282           /* reset key iterator */
01283           di->keyp = di->data->schemadata + di->data->schemata[schema];
01284           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01285 
01286         case di_enterschema: di_enterschema:
01287           if (di->keyname)
01288             di->dp = dataiterator_find_keyname(di, di->keyname);
01289           if (!di->dp || !*di->keyp)
01290             {
01291               if (di->kv.parent)
01292                 goto di_leavesub;
01293               goto di_nextrepodata;
01294             }
01295           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01296 
01297         case di_enterkey: di_enterkey:
01298           di->kv.entry = -1;
01299           di->key = di->data->keys + *di->keyp;
01300           di->ddp = get_data(di->data, di->key, &di->dp, di->keyp[1] && (!di->keyname || (di->flags & SEARCH_SUB) != 0) ? 1 : 0);
01301           if (!di->ddp)
01302             goto di_nextkey;
01303           if (di->key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FIXARRAY || di->key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY)
01304             goto di_enterarray;
01305           if (di->nkeynames && di->nparents - di->rootlevel < di->nkeynames)
01306             goto di_nextkey;
01307           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01308 
01309         case di_nextattr:
01310           di->kv.entry++;
01311           di->ddp = data_fetch(di->ddp, &di->kv, di->key);
01312           if (di->kv.eof)
01313             di->state = di_nextkey;
01314           else
01315             di->state = di_nextattr;
01316           break;
01317 
01318         case di_nextkey: di_nextkey:
01319           if (!di->keyname && *++di->keyp)
01320             goto di_enterkey;
01321           if (di->kv.parent)
01322             goto di_leavesub;
01323           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01324 
01325         case di_nextrepodata: di_nextrepodata:
01326           if (di->repodataid >= 0 && ++di->repodataid < di->repo->nrepodata)
01327               goto di_enterrepodata;
01328           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01329 
01330         case di_nextsolvable: di_nextsolvable:
01331           if (!(di->flags & SEARCH_THISSOLVID))
01332             {
01333               if (di->solvid < 0)
01334                 di->solvid = di->repo->start;
01335               else
01336                 di->solvid++;
01337               for (; di->solvid < di->repo->end; di->solvid++)
01338                 {
01339                   if (di->pool->solvables[di->solvid].repo == di->repo)
01340                     goto di_entersolvable;
01341                 }
01342             }
01343           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01344 
01345         case di_nextrepo: di_nextrepo:
01346           if (di->repoid >= 0)
01347             {
01348               di->repoid++;
01349               di->repodataid = 0;
01350               if (di->repoid < di->pool->nrepos)
01351                 {
01352                   di->repo = di->pool->repos[di->repoid];
01353                   goto di_enterrepo;
01354                 }
01355             }
01356         /* FALLTHROUGH */
01357 
01358         case di_bye: di_bye:
01359           di->state = di_bye;
01360           return 0;
01361 
01362         case di_enterarray: di_enterarray:
01363           if (di->key->name == REPOSITORY_SOLVABLES)
01364             goto di_nextkey;
01365           di->ddp = data_read_id(di->ddp, &di->kv.num);
01366           di->kv.eof = 0;
01367           di->kv.entry = -1;
01368           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01369 
01370         case di_nextarrayelement: di_nextarrayelement:
01371           di->kv.entry++;
01372           if (di->kv.entry)
01373             di->ddp = data_skip_schema(di->data, di->ddp, di->kv.id);
01374           if (di->kv.entry == di->kv.num)
01375             {
01376               if (di->nkeynames && di->nparents - di->rootlevel < di->nkeynames)
01377                 goto di_nextkey;
01378               if (!(di->flags & SEARCH_ARRAYSENTINEL))
01379                 goto di_nextkey;
01380               di->kv.str = (char *)di->ddp;
01381               di->kv.eof = 2;
01382               di->state = di_nextkey;
01383               break;
01384             }
01385           if (di->kv.entry == di->kv.num - 1)
01386             di->kv.eof = 1;
01387           if (di->key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY || !di->kv.entry)
01388             di->ddp = data_read_id(di->ddp, &di->kv.id);
01389           di->kv.str = (char *)di->ddp;
01390           if (di->nkeynames && di->nparents - di->rootlevel < di->nkeynames)
01391             goto di_entersub;
01392           if ((di->flags & SEARCH_SUB) != 0)
01393             di->state = di_entersub;
01394           else
01395             di->state = di_nextarrayelement;
01396           break;
01397 
01398         case di_entersub: di_entersub:
01399           if (di->nparents == sizeof(di->parents)/sizeof(*di->parents) - 1)
01400             goto di_nextarrayelement;   /* sorry, full */
01401           di->parents[di->nparents].kv = di->kv;
01402           di->parents[di->nparents].dp = di->dp;
01403           di->parents[di->nparents].keyp = di->keyp;
01404           di->dp = (unsigned char *)di->kv.str;
01405           di->keyp = di->data->schemadata + di->data->schemata[di->kv.id];
01406           memset(&di->kv, 0, sizeof(di->kv));
01407           di->kv.parent = &di->parents[di->nparents].kv;
01408           di->nparents++;
01409           di->keyname = di->keynames[di->nparents - di->rootlevel];
01410           goto di_enterschema;
01411 
01412         case di_leavesub: di_leavesub:
01413           if (di->nparents - 1 < di->rootlevel)
01414             goto di_bye;
01415           di->nparents--;
01416           di->dp = di->parents[di->nparents].dp;
01417           di->kv = di->parents[di->nparents].kv;
01418           di->keyp = di->parents[di->nparents].keyp;
01419           di->key = di->data->keys + *di->keyp;
01420           di->ddp = (unsigned char *)di->kv.str;
01421           di->keyname = di->keynames[di->nparents - di->rootlevel];
01422           goto di_nextarrayelement;
01423 
01424         /* special solvable attr handling follows */
01425 
01426         case di_nextsolvableattr:
01427           di->kv.id = *di->idp++;
01428           di->kv.entry++;
01429           if (!*di->idp)
01430             {
01431               di->kv.eof = 1;
01432               di->state = di_nextsolvablekey;
01433             }
01434           break;
01435 
01436         case di_nextsolvablekey: di_nextsolvablekey:
01437           if (di->keyname || di->key->name == RPM_RPMDBID)
01438             goto di_enterrepodata;
01439           di->key++;
01440           /* FALLTHROUGH */
01441 
01442         case di_entersolvablekey: di_entersolvablekey:
01443           di->idp = solvabledata_fetch(di->pool->solvables + di->solvid, &di->kv, di->key->name);
01444           if (!di->idp || !di->idp[0])
01445             goto di_nextsolvablekey;
01446           di->kv.id = di->idp[0];
01447           di->kv.num = di->idp[0];
01448           di->idp++;
01449           if (!di->kv.eof && !di->idp[0])
01450             di->kv.eof = 1;
01451           di->kv.entry = 0;
01452           if (di->kv.eof)
01453             di->state = di_nextsolvablekey;
01454           else
01455             di->state = di_nextsolvableattr;
01456           break;
01457         }
01458 
01459       if (di->matcher.match)
01460         {
01461           /* simple pre-check so that we don't need to stringify */
01462           if (di->keyname == SOLVABLE_FILELIST && di->key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_DIRSTRARRAY && di->matcher.match && (di->matcher.flags & (SEARCH_FILES|SEARCH_NOCASE|SEARCH_STRINGMASK)) == (SEARCH_FILES|SEARCH_STRING))
01463             {
01464               int l = strlen(di->matcher.match) - strlen(di->kv.str);
01465               if (l < 0 || strcmp(di->matcher.match + l, di->kv.str))
01466                 continue;
01467             }
01468           if (!repodata_stringify(di->pool, di->data, di->key, &di->kv, di->flags))
01469             {
01470               if (di->keyname && (di->key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FIXARRAY || di->key->type == REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY))
01471                 return 1;
01472               continue;
01473             }
01474           if (!datamatcher_match(&di->matcher, di->kv.str))
01475             continue;
01476         }
01477       /* found something! */
01478       return 1;
01479     }
01480 }
01481 
01482 void
01483 dataiterator_entersub(Dataiterator *di)
01484 {
01485   if (di->state == di_nextarrayelement)
01486     di->state = di_entersub;
01487 }
01488 
01489 void
01490 dataiterator_setpos(Dataiterator *di)
01491 {
01492   if (di->kv.eof == 2)
01493     {
01494       pool_clear_pos(di->pool);
01495       return;
01496     }
01497   di->pool->pos.solvid = di->solvid;
01498   di->pool->pos.repo = di->repo;
01499   di->pool->pos.repodataid = di->data - di->repo->repodata;
01500   di->pool->pos.schema = di->kv.id;
01501   di->pool->pos.dp = (unsigned char *)di->kv.str - di->data->incoredata;
01502 }
01503 
01504 void
01505 dataiterator_setpos_parent(Dataiterator *di)
01506 {
01507   if (!di->kv.parent || di->kv.parent->eof == 2)
01508     {
01509       pool_clear_pos(di->pool);
01510       return;
01511     }
01512   di->pool->pos.solvid = di->solvid;
01513   di->pool->pos.repo = di->repo;
01514   di->pool->pos.repodataid = di->data - di->repo->repodata;
01515   di->pool->pos.schema = di->kv.parent->id;
01516   di->pool->pos.dp = (unsigned char *)di->kv.parent->str - di->data->incoredata;
01517 }
01518 
01519 /* clones just the position, not the search keys/matcher */
01520 void
01521 dataiterator_clonepos(Dataiterator *di, Dataiterator *from)
01522 {
01523   di->state = from->state;
01524   di->flags &= ~SEARCH_THISSOLVID;
01525   di->flags |= (from->flags & SEARCH_THISSOLVID);
01526   di->repo = from->repo;
01527   di->data = from->data;
01528   di->dp = from->dp;
01529   di->ddp = from->ddp;
01530   di->idp = from->idp;
01531   di->keyp = from->keyp;
01532   di->key = from->key;
01533   di->kv = from->kv;
01534   di->repodataid = from->repodataid;
01535   di->solvid = from->solvid;
01536   di->repoid = from->repoid;
01537   di->rootlevel = from->rootlevel;
01538   memcpy(di->parents, from->parents, sizeof(from->parents));
01539   di->nparents = from->nparents;
01540   if (di->nparents)
01541     {
01542       int i;
01543       for (i = 1; i < di->nparents; i++)
01544         di->parents[i].kv.parent = &di->parents[i - 1].kv;
01545       di->kv.parent = &di->parents[di->nparents - 1].kv;
01546     }
01547 }
01548 
01549 void
01550 dataiterator_seek(Dataiterator *di, int whence)
01551 {
01552   if ((whence & DI_SEEK_STAY) != 0)
01553     di->rootlevel = di->nparents;
01554   switch (whence & ~DI_SEEK_STAY)
01555     {
01556     case DI_SEEK_CHILD:
01557       if (di->state != di_nextarrayelement)
01558         break;
01559       if ((whence & DI_SEEK_STAY) != 0)
01560         di->rootlevel = di->nparents + 1;       /* XXX: dangerous! */
01561       di->state = di_entersub;
01562       break;
01563     case DI_SEEK_PARENT:
01564       if (!di->nparents)
01565         {
01566           di->state = di_bye;
01567           break;
01568         }
01569       di->nparents--;
01570       if (di->rootlevel > di->nparents)
01571         di->rootlevel = di->nparents;
01572       di->dp = di->parents[di->nparents].dp;
01573       di->kv = di->parents[di->nparents].kv;
01574       di->keyp = di->parents[di->nparents].keyp;
01575       di->key = di->data->keys + *di->keyp;
01576       di->ddp = (unsigned char *)di->kv.str;
01577       di->keyname = di->keynames[di->nparents - di->rootlevel];
01578       di->state = di_nextarrayelement;
01579       break;
01580     case DI_SEEK_REWIND:
01581       if (!di->nparents)
01582         {
01583           di->state = di_bye;
01584           break;
01585         }
01586       di->dp = (unsigned char *)di->kv.parent->str;
01587       di->keyp = di->data->schemadata + di->data->schemata[di->kv.parent->id];
01588       di->state = di_enterschema;
01589       break;
01590     default:
01591       break;
01592     }
01593 }
01594 
01595 void
01596 dataiterator_skip_attribute(Dataiterator *di)
01597 {
01598   if (di->state == di_nextsolvableattr)
01599     di->state = di_nextsolvablekey;
01600   else
01601     di->state = di_nextkey;
01602 }
01603 
01604 void
01605 dataiterator_skip_solvable(Dataiterator *di)
01606 {
01607   di->nparents = 0;
01608   di->kv.parent = 0;
01609   di->rootlevel = 0;
01610   di->keyname = di->keynames[0];
01611   di->state = di_nextsolvable;
01612 }
01613 
01614 void
01615 dataiterator_skip_repo(Dataiterator *di)
01616 {
01617   di->nparents = 0;
01618   di->kv.parent = 0;
01619   di->rootlevel = 0;
01620   di->keyname = di->keynames[0];
01621   di->state = di_nextrepo;
01622 }
01623 
01624 void
01625 dataiterator_jump_to_solvid(Dataiterator *di, Id solvid)
01626 {
01627   di->nparents = 0;
01628   di->kv.parent = 0;
01629   di->rootlevel = 0;
01630   di->keyname = di->keynames[0];
01631   if (solvid == SOLVID_POS)
01632     {
01633       di->repo = di->pool->pos.repo;
01634       if (!di->repo)
01635         {
01636           di->state = di_bye;
01637           return;
01638         }
01639       di->repoid = -1;
01640       di->data = di->repo->repodata + di->pool->pos.repodataid;
01641       di->repodataid = -1;
01642       di->solvid = solvid;
01643       di->state = di_enterrepo;
01644       di->flags |= SEARCH_THISSOLVID;
01645       return;
01646     }
01647   if (solvid > 0)
01648     {
01649       di->repo = di->pool->solvables[solvid].repo;
01650       di->repoid = -1;
01651     }
01652   else if (di->repoid >= 0)
01653     {
01654       if (!di->pool->nrepos)
01655         {
01656           di->state = di_bye;
01657           return;
01658         }
01659       di->repo = di->pool->repos[0];
01660       di->repoid = 0;
01661     }
01662   di->repodataid = 0;
01663   di->solvid = solvid;
01664   if (solvid)
01665     di->flags |= SEARCH_THISSOLVID;
01666   di->state = di_enterrepo;
01667 }
01668 
01669 void
01670 dataiterator_jump_to_repo(Dataiterator *di, Repo *repo)
01671 {
01672   di->nparents = 0;
01673   di->kv.parent = 0;
01674   di->rootlevel = 0;
01675   di->repo = repo;
01676   di->repoid = -1;
01677   di->repodataid = 0;
01678   di->solvid = 0;
01679   di->flags &= ~SEARCH_THISSOLVID;
01680   di->state = di_enterrepo;
01681 }
01682 
01683 int
01684 dataiterator_match(Dataiterator *di, Datamatcher *ma)
01685 {
01686   if (!repodata_stringify(di->pool, di->data, di->key, &di->kv, di->flags))
01687     return 0;
01688   if (!ma)
01689     return 1;
01690   return datamatcher_match(ma, di->kv.str);
01691 }
01692 
01693 /************************************************************************
01694  * data modify functions
01695  */
01696 
01697 /* extend repodata so that it includes solvables p */
01698 void
01699 repodata_extend(Repodata *data, Id p)
01700 {
01701   if (data->start == data->end)
01702     data->start = data->end = p;
01703   if (p >= data->end)
01704     {
01705       int old = data->end - data->start;
01706       int new = p - data->end + 1;
01707       if (data->attrs)
01708         {
01709           data->attrs = sat_extend(data->attrs, old, new, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01710           memset(data->attrs + old, 0, new * sizeof(Id *));
01711         }
01712       data->incoreoffset = sat_extend(data->incoreoffset, old, new, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01713       memset(data->incoreoffset + old, 0, new * sizeof(Id));
01714       data->end = p + 1;
01715     }
01716   if (p < data->start)
01717     {
01718       int old = data->end - data->start;
01719       int new = data->start - p;
01720       if (data->attrs)
01721         {
01722           data->attrs = sat_extend_resize(data->attrs, old + new, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01723           memmove(data->attrs + new, data->attrs, old * sizeof(Id *));
01724           memset(data->attrs, 0, new * sizeof(Id *));
01725         }
01726       data->incoreoffset = sat_extend_resize(data->incoreoffset, old + new, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01727       memmove(data->incoreoffset + new, data->incoreoffset, old * sizeof(Id));
01728       memset(data->incoreoffset, 0, new * sizeof(Id));
01729       data->start = p;
01730     }
01731 }
01732 
01733 /* shrink end of repodata */
01734 void
01735 repodata_shrink(Repodata *data, int end)
01736 {
01737   int i;
01738 
01739   if (data->end <= end)
01740     return;
01741   if (data->start >= end)
01742     {
01743       if (data->attrs)
01744         {
01745           for (i = 0; i < data->end - data->start; i++)
01746             sat_free(data->attrs[i]);
01747           data->attrs = sat_free(data->attrs);
01748         }
01749       data->incoreoffset = sat_free(data->incoreoffset);
01750       data->start = data->end = 0;
01751       return;
01752     }
01753   if (data->attrs)
01754     {
01755       for (i = end; i < data->end; i++)
01756         sat_free(data->attrs[i - data->start]);
01757       data->attrs = sat_extend_resize(data->attrs, end - data->start, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01758     }
01759   if (data->incoreoffset)
01760     data->incoreoffset = sat_extend_resize(data->incoreoffset, end - data->start, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01761   data->end = end;
01762 }
01763 
01764 /* extend repodata so that it includes solvables from start to start + num - 1 */
01765 void
01766 repodata_extend_block(Repodata *data, Id start, Id num)
01767 {
01768   if (!num)
01769     return;
01770   if (!data->incoreoffset)
01771     {
01772       data->incoreoffset = sat_calloc_block(num, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01773       data->start = start;
01774       data->end = start + num;
01775       return;
01776     }
01777   repodata_extend(data, start);
01778   if (num > 1)
01779     repodata_extend(data, start + num - 1);
01780 }
01781 
01782 /**********************************************************************/
01783 
01784 
01785 #define REPODATA_ATTRS_BLOCK 31
01786 #define REPODATA_ATTRDATA_BLOCK 1023
01787 #define REPODATA_ATTRIDDATA_BLOCK 63
01788 
01789 
01790 Id
01791 repodata_new_handle(Repodata *data)
01792 {
01793   if (!data->nxattrs)
01794     {
01795       data->xattrs = sat_calloc_block(1, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01796       data->nxattrs = 2;
01797     }
01798   data->xattrs = sat_extend(data->xattrs, data->nxattrs, 1, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01799   data->xattrs[data->nxattrs] = 0;
01800   return -(data->nxattrs++);
01801 }
01802 
01803 static inline Id **
01804 repodata_get_attrp(Repodata *data, Id handle)
01805 {
01806   if (handle == SOLVID_META)
01807     {
01808       if (!data->xattrs)
01809         {
01810           data->xattrs = sat_calloc_block(1, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01811           data->nxattrs = 2;
01812         }
01813     }
01814   if (handle < 0)
01815     return data->xattrs - handle;
01816   if (handle < data->start || handle >= data->end)
01817     repodata_extend(data, handle);
01818   if (!data->attrs)
01819     data->attrs = sat_calloc_block(data->end - data->start, sizeof(Id *), REPODATA_BLOCK);
01820   return data->attrs + (handle - data->start);
01821 }
01822 
01823 static void
01824 repodata_insert_keyid(Repodata *data, Id handle, Id keyid, Id val, int overwrite)
01825 {
01826   Id *pp;
01827   Id *ap, **app;
01828   int i;
01829 
01830   app = repodata_get_attrp(data, handle);
01831   ap = *app;
01832   i = 0;
01833   if (ap)
01834     {
01835       /* Determine equality based on the name only, allows us to change
01836          type (when overwrite is set), and makes TYPE_CONSTANT work.  */
01837       for (pp = ap; *pp; pp += 2)
01838         if (data->keys[*pp].name == data->keys[keyid].name)
01839           break;
01840       if (*pp)
01841         {
01842           if (overwrite)
01843             {
01844               pp[0] = keyid;
01845               pp[1] = val;
01846             }
01847           return;
01848         }
01849       i = pp - ap;
01850     }
01851   ap = sat_extend(ap, i, 3, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_ATTRS_BLOCK);
01852   *app = ap;
01853   pp = ap + i;
01854   *pp++ = keyid;
01855   *pp++ = val;
01856   *pp = 0;
01857 }
01858 
01859 
01860 static void
01861 repodata_set(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Repokey *key, Id val)
01862 {
01863   Id keyid;
01864 
01865   keyid = repodata_key2id(data, key, 1);
01866   repodata_insert_keyid(data, solvid, keyid, val, 1);
01867 }
01868 
01869 void
01870 repodata_set_id(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id id)
01871 {
01872   Repokey key;
01873   key.name = keyname;
01874   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_ID;
01875   key.size = 0;
01876   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01877   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, id);
01878 }
01879 
01880 void
01881 repodata_set_num(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, unsigned int num)
01882 {
01883   Repokey key;
01884   key.name = keyname;
01885   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_NUM;
01886   key.size = 0;
01887   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01888   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, (Id)num);
01889 }
01890 
01891 void
01892 repodata_set_poolstr(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, const char *str)
01893 {
01894   Repokey key;
01895   Id id;
01896   if (data->localpool)
01897     id = stringpool_str2id(&data->spool, str, 1);
01898   else
01899     id = str2id(data->repo->pool, str, 1);
01900   key.name = keyname;
01901   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_ID;
01902   key.size = 0;
01903   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01904   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, id);
01905 }
01906 
01907 void
01908 repodata_set_constant(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, unsigned int constant)
01909 {
01910   Repokey key;
01911   key.name = keyname;
01912   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANT;
01913   key.size = constant;
01914   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01915   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, 0);
01916 }
01917 
01918 void
01919 repodata_set_constantid(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id id)
01920 {
01921   Repokey key;
01922   key.name = keyname;
01923   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID;
01924   key.size = id;
01925   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01926   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, 0);
01927 }
01928 
01929 void
01930 repodata_set_void(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname)
01931 {
01932   Repokey key;
01933   key.name = keyname;
01934   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_VOID;
01935   key.size = 0;
01936   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01937   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, 0);
01938 }
01939 
01940 void
01941 repodata_set_str(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, const char *str)
01942 {
01943   Repokey key;
01944   int l;
01945 
01946   l = strlen(str) + 1;
01947   key.name = keyname;
01948   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_STR;
01949   key.size = 0;
01950   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01951   data->attrdata = sat_extend(data->attrdata, data->attrdatalen, l, 1, REPODATA_ATTRDATA_BLOCK);
01952   memcpy(data->attrdata + data->attrdatalen, str, l);
01953   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, data->attrdatalen);
01954   data->attrdatalen += l;
01955 }
01956 
01957 void
01958 repodata_set_binary(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, void *buf, int len)
01959 {
01960   Repokey key;
01961   unsigned char *dp;
01962 
01963   key.name = keyname;
01964   key.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_BINARY;
01965   key.size = 0;
01966   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
01967   data->attrdata = sat_extend(data->attrdata, data->attrdatalen, len + 5, 1, REPODATA_ATTRDATA_BLOCK);
01968   dp = data->attrdata + data->attrdatalen;
01969   if (len >= (1 << 14))
01970     {
01971       if (len >= (1 << 28))
01972         *dp++ = (len >> 28) | 128;
01973       if (len >= (1 << 21))
01974         *dp++ = (len >> 21) | 128;
01975       *dp++ = (len >> 14) | 128;
01976     }
01977   if (len >= (1 << 7))
01978     *dp++ = (len >> 7) | 128;
01979   *dp++ = len & 127;
01980   if (len)
01981     memcpy(dp, buf, len);
01982   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, data->attrdatalen);
01983   data->attrdatalen = dp + len - data->attrdata;
01984 }
01985 
01986 /* add an array element consisting of entrysize Ids to the repodata. modifies attriddata
01987  * so that the caller can append the new element there */
01988 static void
01989 repodata_add_array(Repodata *data, Id handle, Id keyname, Id keytype, int entrysize)
01990 {
01991   int oldsize;
01992   Id *ida, *pp, **ppp;
01993 
01994   /* check if it is the same as last time, this speeds things up a lot */
01995   if (handle == data->lasthandle && data->keys[data->lastkey].name == keyname && data->keys[data->lastkey].type == keytype && data->attriddatalen == data->lastdatalen)
01996     {
01997       /* great! just append the new data */
01998       data->attriddata = sat_extend(data->attriddata, data->attriddatalen, entrysize, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_ATTRIDDATA_BLOCK);
01999       data->attriddatalen--;    /* overwrite terminating 0  */
02000       data->lastdatalen += entrysize;
02001       return;
02002     }
02003 
02004   ppp = repodata_get_attrp(data, handle);
02005   pp = *ppp;
02006   if (pp)
02007     for (; *pp; pp += 2)
02008       if (data->keys[*pp].name == keyname && data->keys[*pp].type == keytype)
02009         break;
02010   if (!pp || !*pp)
02011     {
02012       /* not found. allocate new key */
02013       Repokey key;
02014       key.name = keyname;
02015       key.type = keytype;
02016       key.size = 0;
02017       key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
02018       data->attriddata = sat_extend(data->attriddata, data->attriddatalen, entrysize + 1, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_ATTRIDDATA_BLOCK);
02019       repodata_set(data, handle, &key, data->attriddatalen);
02020       data->lasthandle = 0;     /* next time... */
02021       return;
02022     }
02023   oldsize = 0;
02024   for (ida = data->attriddata + pp[1]; *ida; ida += entrysize)
02025     oldsize += entrysize;
02026   if (ida + 1 == data->attriddata + data->attriddatalen)
02027     {
02028       /* this was the last entry, just append it */
02029       data->attriddata = sat_extend(data->attriddata, data->attriddatalen, entrysize, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_ATTRIDDATA_BLOCK);
02030       data->attriddatalen--;    /* overwrite terminating 0  */
02031     }
02032   else
02033     {
02034       /* too bad. move to back. */
02035       data->attriddata = sat_extend(data->attriddata, data->attriddatalen,  oldsize + entrysize + 1, sizeof(Id), REPODATA_ATTRIDDATA_BLOCK);
02036       memcpy(data->attriddata + data->attriddatalen, data->attriddata + pp[1], oldsize * sizeof(Id));
02037       pp[1] = data->attriddatalen;
02038       data->attriddatalen += oldsize;
02039     }
02040   data->lasthandle = handle;
02041   data->lastkey = *pp;
02042   data->lastdatalen = data->attriddatalen + entrysize + 1;
02043 }
02044 
02045 void
02046 repodata_set_bin_checksum(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id type,
02047                       const unsigned char *str)
02048 {
02049   Repokey key;
02050   int l;
02051 
02052   if (!(l = sat_chksum_len(type)))
02053     return;
02054   key.name = keyname;
02055   key.type = type;
02056   key.size = 0;
02057   key.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
02058   data->attrdata = sat_extend(data->attrdata, data->attrdatalen, l, 1, REPODATA_ATTRDATA_BLOCK);
02059   memcpy(data->attrdata + data->attrdatalen, str, l);
02060   repodata_set(data, solvid, &key, data->attrdatalen);
02061   data->attrdatalen += l;
02062 }
02063 
02064 static int
02065 hexstr2bytes(unsigned char *buf, const char *str, int buflen)
02066 {
02067   int i;
02068   for (i = 0; i < buflen; i++)
02069     {
02070 #define c2h(c) (((c)>='0' && (c)<='9') ? ((c)-'0')              \
02071                 : ((c)>='a' && (c)<='f') ? ((c)-('a'-10))       \
02072                 : ((c)>='A' && (c)<='F') ? ((c)-('A'-10))       \
02073                 : -1)
02074       int v = c2h(*str);
02075       str++;
02076       if (v < 0)
02077         return 0;
02078       buf[i] = v;
02079       v = c2h(*str);
02080       str++;
02081       if (v < 0)
02082         return 0;
02083       buf[i] = (buf[i] << 4) | v;
02084 #undef c2h
02085     }
02086   return buflen;
02087 }
02088 
02089 void
02090 repodata_set_checksum(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id type,
02091                       const char *str)
02092 {
02093   unsigned char buf[64];
02094   int l;
02095 
02096   if (!(l = sat_chksum_len(type)))
02097     return;
02098   if (hexstr2bytes(buf, str, l) != l)
02099     return;
02100   repodata_set_bin_checksum(data, solvid, keyname, type, buf);
02101 }
02102 
02103 const char *
02104 repodata_chk2str(Repodata *data, Id type, const unsigned char *buf)
02105 {
02106   int i, l;
02107   char *str, *s;
02108 
02109   if (!(l = sat_chksum_len(type)))
02110     return "";
02111   s = str = pool_alloctmpspace(data->repo->pool, 2 * l + 1);
02112   for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
02113     {
02114       unsigned char v = buf[i];
02115       unsigned char w = v >> 4;
02116       *s++ = w >= 10 ? w + ('a' - 10) : w + '0';
02117       w = v & 15;
02118       *s++ = w >= 10 ? w + ('a' - 10) : w + '0';
02119     }
02120   *s = 0;
02121   return str;
02122 }
02123 
02124 /* rpm filenames don't contain the epoch, so strip it */
02125 static inline const char *
02126 evrid2vrstr(Pool *pool, Id evrid)
02127 {
02128   const char *p, *evr = id2str(pool, evrid);
02129   if (!evr)
02130     return evr;
02131   for (p = evr; *p >= '0' && *p <= '9'; p++)
02132     ;
02133   return p != evr && *p == ':' ? p + 1 : evr;
02134 }
02135 
02136 void
02137 repodata_set_location(Repodata *data, Id solvid, int medianr, const char *dir, const char *file)
02138 {
02139   Pool *pool = data->repo->pool;
02140   Solvable *s;
02141   const char *str, *fp;
02142   int l = 0;
02143 
02144   if (medianr)
02145     repodata_set_constant(data, solvid, SOLVABLE_MEDIANR, medianr);
02146   if (!dir)
02147     {
02148       if ((dir = strrchr(file, '/')) != 0)
02149         {
02150           l = dir - file;
02151           dir = file;
02152           file = dir + l + 1;
02153           if (!l)
02154             l++;
02155         }
02156     }
02157   else
02158     l = strlen(dir);
02159   if (l >= 2 && dir[0] == '.' && dir[1] == '/' && (l == 2 || dir[2] != '/'))
02160     {
02161       dir += 2;
02162       l -= 2;
02163     }
02164   if (l == 1 && dir[0] == '.')
02165     l = 0;
02166   s = pool->solvables + solvid;
02167   if (dir && l)
02168     {
02169       str = id2str(pool, s->arch);
02170       if (!strncmp(dir, str, l) && !str[l])
02171         repodata_set_void(data, solvid, SOLVABLE_MEDIADIR);
02172       else if (!dir[l])
02173         repodata_set_str(data, solvid, SOLVABLE_MEDIADIR, dir);
02174       else
02175         {
02176           char *dir2 = strdup(dir);
02177           dir2[l] = 0;
02178           repodata_set_str(data, solvid, SOLVABLE_MEDIADIR, dir2);
02179           free(dir2);
02180         }
02181     }
02182   fp = file;
02183   str = id2str(pool, s->name);
02184   l = strlen(str);
02185   if ((!l || !strncmp(fp, str, l)) && fp[l] == '-')
02186     {
02187       fp += l + 1;
02188       str = evrid2vrstr(pool, s->evr);
02189       l = strlen(str);
02190       if ((!l || !strncmp(fp, str, l)) && fp[l] == '.')
02191         {
02192           fp += l + 1;
02193           str = id2str(pool, s->arch);
02194           l = strlen(str);
02195           if ((!l || !strncmp(fp, str, l)) && !strcmp(fp + l, ".rpm"))
02196             {
02197               repodata_set_void(data, solvid, SOLVABLE_MEDIAFILE);
02198               return;
02199             }
02200         }
02201     }
02202   repodata_set_str(data, solvid, SOLVABLE_MEDIAFILE, file);
02203 }
02204 
02205 void
02206 repodata_add_dirnumnum(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id dir, Id num, Id num2)
02207 {
02208   assert(dir);
02209 #if 0
02210 fprintf(stderr, "repodata_add_dirnumnum %d %d %d %d (%d)\n", solvid, dir, num, num2, data->attriddatalen);
02211 #endif
02212   repodata_add_array(data, solvid, keyname, REPOKEY_TYPE_DIRNUMNUMARRAY, 3);
02213   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = dir;
02214   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = num;
02215   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = num2;
02216   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = 0;
02217 }
02218 
02219 void
02220 repodata_add_dirstr(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id dir, const char *str)
02221 {
02222   Id stroff;
02223   int l;
02224 
02225   assert(dir);
02226   l = strlen(str) + 1;
02227   data->attrdata = sat_extend(data->attrdata, data->attrdatalen, l, 1, REPODATA_ATTRDATA_BLOCK);
02228   memcpy(data->attrdata + data->attrdatalen, str, l);
02229   stroff = data->attrdatalen;
02230   data->attrdatalen += l;
02231 
02232 #if 0
02233 fprintf(stderr, "repodata_add_dirstr %d %d %s (%d)\n", solvid, dir, str,  data->attriddatalen);
02234 #endif
02235   repodata_add_array(data, solvid, keyname, REPOKEY_TYPE_DIRSTRARRAY, 2);
02236   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = dir;
02237   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = stroff;
02238   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = 0;
02239 }

02246 #endif

02253 repodata_add_poolstr_array(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname,
02254                            const char *str)
02255 {
02256   Id id;
02257   if (data->localpool)
02258     id = stringpool_str2id(&data->spool, str, 1);
02259   else
02260     id = str2id(data->repo->pool, str, 1);

02265 repodata_add_fixarray(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id ghandle)

02273 repodata_add_flexarray(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname, Id ghandle)
02274 {
02275   repodata_add_array(data, solvid, keyname, REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY, 1);
02276   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = ghandle;
02277   data->attriddata[data->attriddatalen++] = 0;
