02279 
02280 void
02281 repodata_delete_uninternalized(Repodata *data, Id solvid, Id keyname)
02282 {
02283   Id *pp, *ap, **app;
02284   app = repodata_get_attrp(data, solvid);
02285   ap = *app;
02286   if (!ap)
02287     return;
02288   for (; *ap; ap += 2)
02289     if (data->keys[*ap].name == keyname)
02290       break;
02291   if (!*ap)
02292     return;
02293   pp = ap;
02294   ap += 2;
02295   for (; *ap; ap += 2)
02296     {
02297       if (data->keys[*ap].name == keyname)
02298         continue;
02299       *pp++ = ap[0];
02300       *pp++ = ap[1];
02301     }
02302   *pp = 0;
02303 }
02304 
02305 /* add all attrs from src to dest */
02306 void
02307 repodata_merge_attrs(Repodata *data, Id dest, Id src)
02308 {
02309   Id *keyp;
02310   if (dest == src || !(keyp = data->attrs[src - data->start]))
02311     return;
02312   for (; *keyp; keyp += 2)
02313     repodata_insert_keyid(data, dest, keyp[0], keyp[1], 0);
02314 }
02315 
02316 void
02317 repodata_merge_some_attrs(Repodata *data, Id dest, Id src, Map *keyidmap, int overwrite)
02318 {
02319   Id *keyp;
02320   if (dest == src || !(keyp = data->attrs[src - data->start]))
02321     return;
02322   for (; *keyp; keyp += 2)
02323     if (!keyidmap || MAPTST(keyidmap, keyp[0]))
02324       repodata_insert_keyid(data, dest, keyp[0], keyp[1], overwrite);
02325 }
02326 
02327 
02328 
02329 /**********************************************************************/
02330 
02331 /* TODO: unify with repo_write and repo_solv! */
02332 
02333 #define EXTDATA_BLOCK 1023
02334 
02335 struct extdata {
02336   unsigned char *buf;
02337   int len;
02338 };
02339 
02340 static void
02341 data_addid(struct extdata *xd, Id x)
02342 {
02343   unsigned char *dp;
02344 
02345   xd->buf = sat_extend(xd->buf, xd->len, 5, 1, EXTDATA_BLOCK);
02346   dp = xd->buf + xd->len;
02347 
02348   if (x >= (1 << 14))
02349     {
02350       if (x >= (1 << 28))
02351         *dp++ = (x >> 28) | 128;
02352       if (x >= (1 << 21))
02353         *dp++ = (x >> 21) | 128;
02354       *dp++ = (x >> 14) | 128;
02355     }
02356   if (x >= (1 << 7))
02357     *dp++ = (x >> 7) | 128;
02358   *dp++ = x & 127;
02359   xd->len = dp - xd->buf;
02360 }
02361 
02362 static void
02363 data_addideof(struct extdata *xd, Id x, int eof)
02364 {
02365   if (x >= 64)
02366     x = (x & 63) | ((x & ~63) << 1);
02367   data_addid(xd, (eof ? x : x | 64));
02368 }
02369 
02370 static void
02371 data_addblob(struct extdata *xd, unsigned char *blob, int len)
02372 {
02373   xd->buf = sat_extend(xd->buf, xd->len, len, 1, EXTDATA_BLOCK);
02374   memcpy(xd->buf + xd->len, blob, len);
02375   xd->len += len;
02376 }
02377 
02378 /*********************************/
02379 
02380 static void
02381 repodata_serialize_key(Repodata *data, struct extdata *newincore,
02382                        struct extdata *newvincore,
02383                        Id *schema,
02384                        Repokey *key, Id val)
02385 {
02386   /* Otherwise we have a new value.  Parse it into the internal
02387      form.  */
02388   Id *ida;
02389   struct extdata *xd;
02390   unsigned int oldvincorelen = 0;
02391   Id schemaid, *sp;
02392 
02393   xd = newincore;
02394   if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_VERTICAL_OFFSET)
02395     {
02396       xd = newvincore;
02397       oldvincorelen = xd->len;
02398     }
02399   switch (key->type)
02400     {
02401     case REPOKEY_TYPE_VOID:
02402     case REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANT:
02403     case REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID:
02404       break;
02405     case REPOKEY_TYPE_STR:
02406       data_addblob(xd, data->attrdata + val, strlen((char *)(data->attrdata + val)) + 1);
02407       break;
02408     case REPOKEY_TYPE_MD5:
02409       data_addblob(xd, data->attrdata + val, SIZEOF_MD5);
02410       break;
02411     case REPOKEY_TYPE_SHA1:
02412       data_addblob(xd, data->attrdata + val, SIZEOF_SHA1);
02413       break;
02414     case REPOKEY_TYPE_SHA256:
02415       data_addblob(xd, data->attrdata + val, SIZEOF_SHA256);
02416       break;
02417     case REPOKEY_TYPE_ID:
02418     case REPOKEY_TYPE_NUM:
02419     case REPOKEY_TYPE_DIR:
02420       data_addid(xd, val);
02421       break;
02422     case REPOKEY_TYPE_BINARY:
02423       {
02424         Id len;
02425         unsigned char *dp = data_read_id(data->attrdata + val, &len);
02426         dp += len;
02427         data_addblob(xd, data->attrdata + val, dp - (data->attrdata + val));
02428       }
02429       break;
02430     case REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY:
02431       for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida++)
02432         data_addideof(xd, ida[0], ida[1] ? 0 : 1);
02433       break;
02434     case REPOKEY_TYPE_DIRNUMNUMARRAY:
02435       for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida += 3)
02436         {
02437           data_addid(xd, ida[0]);
02438           data_addid(xd, ida[1]);
02439           data_addideof(xd, ida[2], ida[3] ? 0 : 1);
02440         }
02441       break;
02442     case REPOKEY_TYPE_DIRSTRARRAY:
02443       for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida += 2)
02444         {
02445           data_addideof(xd, ida[0], ida[2] ? 0 : 1);
02446           data_addblob(xd, data->attrdata + ida[1], strlen((char *)(data->attrdata + ida[1])) + 1);
02447         }
02448       break;
02449     case REPOKEY_TYPE_FIXARRAY:
02450       {
02451         int num = 0;
02452         schemaid = 0;
02453         for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida++)
02454           {
02455 #if 0
02456             fprintf(stderr, "serialize struct %d\n", *ida);
02457 #endif
02458             sp = schema;
02459             Id *kp = data->xattrs[-*ida];
02460             if (!kp)
02461               continue;
02462             num++;
02463             for (;*kp; kp += 2)
02464               {
02465 #if 0
02466                 fprintf(stderr, "  %s:%d\n", id2str(data->repo->pool, data->keys[*kp].name), kp[1]);
02467 #endif
02468                 *sp++ = *kp;
02469               }
02470             *sp = 0;
02471             if (!schemaid)
02472               schemaid = repodata_schema2id(data, schema, 1);
02473             else if (schemaid != repodata_schema2id(data, schema, 0))
02474               {
02475                 pool_debug(data->repo->pool, SAT_FATAL, "fixarray substructs with different schemas\n");
02476                 exit(1);
02477               }
02478 #if 0
02479             fprintf(stderr, "  schema %d\n", schemaid);
02480 #endif
02481           }
02482         if (!num)
02483           break;
02484         data_addid(xd, num);
02485         data_addid(xd, schemaid);
02486         for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida++)
02487           {
02488             Id *kp = data->xattrs[-*ida];
02489             if (!kp)
02490               continue;
02491             for (;*kp; kp += 2)
02492               {
02493                 repodata_serialize_key(data, newincore, newvincore,
02494                                        schema, data->keys + *kp, kp[1]);
02495               }
02496           }
02497         break;
02498       }
02499     case REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY:
02500       {
02501         int num = 0;
02502         for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida++)
02503           num++;
02504         data_addid(xd, num);
02505         for (ida = data->attriddata + val; *ida; ida++)
02506           {
02507             Id *kp = data->xattrs[-*ida];
02508             if (!kp)
02509               {
02510                 data_addid(xd, 0);      /* XXX */
02511                 continue;
02512               }
02513             sp = schema;
02514             for (;*kp; kp += 2)
02515               *sp++ = *kp;
02516             *sp = 0;
02517             schemaid = repodata_schema2id(data, schema, 1);
02518             data_addid(xd, schemaid);
02519             kp = data->xattrs[-*ida];
02520             for (;*kp; kp += 2)
02521               {
02522                 repodata_serialize_key(data, newincore, newvincore,
02523                                        schema, data->keys + *kp, kp[1]);
02524               }
02525           }
02526         break;
02527       }
02528     default:
02529       pool_debug(data->repo->pool, SAT_FATAL, "don't know how to handle type %d\n", key->type);
02530       exit(1);
02531     }
02532   if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_VERTICAL_OFFSET)
02533     {
02534       /* put offset/len in incore */
02535       data_addid(newincore, data->lastverticaloffset + oldvincorelen);
02536       oldvincorelen = xd->len - oldvincorelen;
02537       data_addid(newincore, oldvincorelen);
02538     }
02539 }
02540 
02541 void
02542 repodata_internalize(Repodata *data)
02543 {
02544   Repokey *key, solvkey;
02545   Id entry, nentry;
02546   Id schemaid, *schema, *sp, oldschema, *keyp, *keypstart, *seen;
02547   unsigned char *dp, *ndp;
02548   int newschema, oldcount;
02549   struct extdata newincore;
02550   struct extdata newvincore;
02551   Id solvkeyid;
02552 
02553   if (!data->attrs && !data->xattrs)
02554     return;
02555 
02556   newvincore.buf = data->vincore;
02557   newvincore.len = data->vincorelen;
02558 
02559   /* find the solvables key, create if needed */
02560   memset(&solvkey, 0, sizeof(solvkey));
02561   solvkey.name = REPOSITORY_SOLVABLES;
02562   solvkey.type = REPOKEY_TYPE_FLEXARRAY;
02563   solvkey.size = 0;
02564   solvkey.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
02565   solvkeyid = repodata_key2id(data, &solvkey, data->end != data->start ? 1 : 0);
02566 
02567   schema = sat_malloc2(data->nkeys, sizeof(Id));
02568   seen = sat_malloc2(data->nkeys, sizeof(Id));
02569 
02570   /* Merge the data already existing (in data->schemata, ->incoredata and
02571      friends) with the new attributes in data->attrs[].  */
02572   nentry = data->end - data->start;
02573   memset(&newincore, 0, sizeof(newincore));
02574   data_addid(&newincore, 0);    /* start data at offset 1 */
02575 
02576   data->mainschema = 0;
02577   data->mainschemaoffsets = sat_free(data->mainschemaoffsets);
02578 
02579   /* join entry data */
02580   /* we start with the meta data, entry -1 */
02581   for (entry = -1; entry < nentry; entry++)
02582     {
02583       memset(seen, 0, data->nkeys * sizeof(Id));
02584       oldschema = 0;
02585       dp = data->incoredata;
02586       if (dp)
02587         {
02588           dp += entry >= 0 ? data->incoreoffset[entry] : 1;
02589           dp = data_read_id(dp, &oldschema);
02590         }
02591 #if 0
02592 fprintf(stderr, "oldschema %d\n", oldschema);
02593 fprintf(stderr, "schemata %d\n", data->schemata[oldschema]);
02594 fprintf(stderr, "schemadata %p\n", data->schemadata);
02595 #endif
02596       /* seen: -1: old data  0: skipped  >0: id + 1 */
02597       newschema = 0;
02598       oldcount = 0;
02599       sp = schema;
02600       for (keyp = data->schemadata + data->schemata[oldschema]; *keyp; keyp++)
02601         {
02602           if (seen[*keyp])
02603             {
02604               pool_debug(data->repo->pool, SAT_FATAL, "Inconsistent old data (key occured twice).\n");
02605               exit(1);
02606             }
02607           seen[*keyp] = -1;
02608           *sp++ = *keyp;
02609           oldcount++;
02610         }
02611       if (entry >= 0)
02612         keyp = data->attrs ? data->attrs[entry] : 0;
02613       else
02614         {
02615           /* strip solvables key */
02616           *sp = 0;
02617           for (sp = keyp = schema; *sp; sp++)
02618             if (*sp != solvkeyid)
02619               *keyp++ = *sp;
02620             else
02621               oldcount--;
02622           sp = keyp;
02623           seen[solvkeyid] = 0;
02624           keyp = data->xattrs ? data->xattrs[1] : 0;
02625         }
02626       if (keyp)
02627         for (; *keyp; keyp += 2)
02628           {
02629             if (!seen[*keyp])
02630               {
02631                 newschema = 1;
02632                 *sp++ = *keyp;
02633               }
02634             seen[*keyp] = keyp[1] + 1;
02635           }
02636       if (entry < 0 && data->end != data->start)
02637         {
02638           *sp++ = solvkeyid;
02639           newschema = 1;
02640         }
02641       *sp = 0;
02642       if (newschema)
02643         /* Ideally we'd like to sort the new schema here, to ensure
02644            schema equality independend of the ordering.  We can't do that
02645            yet.  For once see below (old ids need to come before new ids).
02646            An additional difficulty is that we also need to move
02647            the values with the keys.  */
02648         schemaid = repodata_schema2id(data, schema, 1);
02649       else
02650         schemaid = oldschema;
02651 
02652 
02653       /* Now create data blob.  We walk through the (possibly new) schema
02654          and either copy over old data, or insert the new.  */
02655       /* XXX Here we rely on the fact that the (new) schema has the form
02656          o1 o2 o3 o4 ... | n1 n2 n3 ...
02657          (oX being the old keyids (possibly overwritten), and nX being
02658           the new keyids).  This rules out sorting the keyids in order
02659          to ensure a small schema count.  */
02660       if (entry >= 0)
02661         data->incoreoffset[entry] = newincore.len;
02662       data_addid(&newincore, schemaid);
02663       if (entry == -1)
02664         {
02665           data->mainschema = schemaid;
02666           data->mainschemaoffsets = sat_calloc(sp - schema, sizeof(Id));
02667         }
02668       keypstart = data->schemadata + data->schemata[schemaid];
02669       for (keyp = keypstart; *keyp; keyp++)
02670         {
02671           if (entry == -1)
02672             data->mainschemaoffsets[keyp - keypstart] = newincore.len;
02673           if (*keyp == solvkeyid)
02674             {
02675               /* add flexarray entry count */
02676               data_addid(&newincore, data->end - data->start);
02677               break;
02678             }
02679           key = data->keys + *keyp;
02680 #if 0
02681           fprintf(stderr, "internalize %d(%d):%s:%s\n", entry, entry + data->start, id2str(data->repo->pool, key->name), id2str(data->repo->pool, key->type));
02682 #endif
02683           ndp = dp;
02684           if (oldcount)
02685             {
02686               /* Skip the data associated with this old key.  */
02687               if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_VERTICAL_OFFSET)
02688                 {
02689                   ndp = data_skip(dp, REPOKEY_TYPE_ID);
02690                   ndp = data_skip(ndp, REPOKEY_TYPE_ID);
02691                 }
02692               else if (key->storage == KEY_STORAGE_INCORE)
02693                 ndp = data_skip_key(data, dp, key);
02694               oldcount--;
02695             }
02696           if (seen[*keyp] == -1)
02697             {
02698               /* If this key was an old one _and_ was not overwritten with
02699                  a different value copy over the old value (we skipped it
02700                  above).  */
02701               if (dp != ndp)
02702                 data_addblob(&newincore, dp, ndp - dp);
02703               seen[*keyp] = 0;
02704             }
02705           else if (seen[*keyp])
02706             {
02707               /* Otherwise we have a new value.  Parse it into the internal
02708                  form.  */
02709               repodata_serialize_key(data, &newincore, &newvincore,
02710                                      schema, key, seen[*keyp] - 1);
02711             }
02712           dp = ndp;
02713         }
02714       if (entry >= 0 && data->attrs && data->attrs[entry])
02715         data->attrs[entry] = sat_free(data->attrs[entry]);
02716     }
02717   /* free all xattrs */
02718   for (entry = 0; entry < data->nxattrs; entry++)
02719     if (data->xattrs[entry])
02720       sat_free(data->xattrs[entry]);
02721   data->xattrs = sat_free(data->xattrs);
02722   data->nxattrs = 0;
02723 
02724   data->lasthandle = 0;
02725   data->lastkey = 0;
02726   data->lastdatalen = 0;
02727   sat_free(schema);
02728   sat_free(seen);
02729   repodata_free_schemahash(data);
02730 
02731   sat_free(data->incoredata);
02732   data->incoredata = newincore.buf;
02733   data->incoredatalen = newincore.len;
02734   data->incoredatafree = 0;
02735 
02736   sat_free(data->vincore);
02737   data->vincore = newvincore.buf;
02738   data->vincorelen = newvincore.len;
02739 
02740   data->attrs = sat_free(data->attrs);
02741   data->attrdata = sat_free(data->attrdata);
02742   data->attriddata = sat_free(data->attriddata);
02743   data->attrdatalen = 0;
02744   data->attriddatalen = 0;
02745 }
02746 
02747 void
02748 repodata_disable_paging(Repodata *data)
02749 {
02750   if (maybe_load_repodata(data, 0))
02751     repopagestore_disable_paging(&data->store);
02752 }
02753 
02754 static void
02755 repodata_load_stub(Repodata *data)
02756 {
02757   Repo *repo = data->repo;
02758   Pool *pool = repo->pool;
02759   int r;
02760 
02761   if (!pool->loadcallback)
02762     {
02763       data->state = REPODATA_ERROR;
02764       return;
02765     }
02766   data->state = REPODATA_LOADING;
02767   r = pool->loadcallback(pool, data, pool->loadcallbackdata);
02768   if (!r)
02769     data->state = REPODATA_ERROR;
02770 }
02771 
02772 void
02773 repodata_create_stubs(Repodata *data)
02774 {
02775   Repo *repo = data->repo;
02776   Pool *pool = repo->pool;
02777   Repodata *sdata;
02778   int *stubdataids;
02779   Dataiterator di;
02780   Id xkeyname = 0;
02781   int i, cnt = 0;
02782   int repodataid;
02783   int datastart, dataend;
02784 
02785   repodataid = data - repo->repodata;
02786   datastart = data->start;
02787   dataend = data->end;
02788   dataiterator_init(&di, pool, repo, SOLVID_META, REPOSITORY_EXTERNAL, 0, 0);
02789   while (dataiterator_step(&di))
02790     {
02791       if (di.data - repo->repodata != repodataid)
02792         continue;
02793       cnt++;
02794     }
02795   dataiterator_free(&di);
02796   if (!cnt)
02797     return;
02798   stubdataids = sat_calloc(cnt, sizeof(*stubdataids));
02799   for (i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
02800     {
02801       sdata = repo_add_repodata(repo, 0);
02802       if (dataend > datastart)
02803         repodata_extend_block(sdata, datastart, dataend - datastart);
02804       stubdataids[i] = sdata - repo->repodata;
02805       sdata->state = REPODATA_STUB;
02806       sdata->loadcallback = repodata_load_stub;
02807     }
02808   i = 0;
02809   dataiterator_init(&di, pool, repo, SOLVID_META, REPOSITORY_EXTERNAL, 0, 0);
02810   sdata = 0;
02811   while (dataiterator_step(&di))
02812     {
02813       if (di.data - repo->repodata != repodataid)
02814         continue;
02815       if (di.key->name == REPOSITORY_EXTERNAL && !di.nparents)
02816         {
02817           dataiterator_entersub(&di);
02818           sdata = repo->repodata + stubdataids[i++];
02819           xkeyname = 0;
02820           continue;
02821         }
02822       switch (di.key->type)
02823         {
02824         case REPOKEY_TYPE_ID:
02825           repodata_set_id(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name, di.kv.id);
02826           break;
02827         case REPOKEY_TYPE_CONSTANTID:
02828           repodata_set_constantid(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name, di.kv.id);
02829           break;
02830         case REPOKEY_TYPE_STR:
02831           repodata_set_str(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name, di.kv.str);
02832           break;
02833         case REPOKEY_TYPE_VOID:
02834           repodata_set_void(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name);
02835           break;
02836         case REPOKEY_TYPE_NUM:
02837           repodata_set_num(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name, di.kv.num);
02838           break;
02839         case REPOKEY_TYPE_MD5:
02840         case REPOKEY_TYPE_SHA1:
02841         case REPOKEY_TYPE_SHA256:
02842           repodata_set_bin_checksum(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name, di.key->type, (const unsigned char *)di.kv.str);
02843           break;
02844         case REPOKEY_TYPE_IDARRAY:
02845           repodata_add_idarray(sdata, SOLVID_META, di.key->name, di.kv.id);
02846           if (di.key->name == REPOSITORY_KEYS)
02847             {
02848               Repokey xkey;
02849 
02850               if (!xkeyname)
02851                 {
02852                   if (!di.kv.eof)
02853                     xkeyname = di.kv.id;
02854                   continue;
02855                 }
02856               xkey.name = xkeyname;
02857               xkey.type = di.kv.id;
02858               xkey.storage = KEY_STORAGE_INCORE;
02859               xkey.size = 0; 
02860               repodata_key2id(sdata, &xkey, 1);
02861               xkeyname = 0;
02862             }
02863         }
02864     }
02865   dataiterator_free(&di);
02866   for (i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
02867     repodata_internalize(repo->repodata + stubdataids[i]);
02868   sat_free(stubdataids);
02869 }
